                          "title": "Wynwood Pride",
                          "description": "Sourced from predicthq.com - Wynwood Pride is a dynamic, month-long celebration of LGBTQ+ culture, community, and creativity held every June in Miami’s Wynwood Arts District. The event blends high-energy performances, drag shows, art exhibitions, music, and community-focused programming across various venues, making it one of South Florida’s most inclusive and colorful Pride festivals. It spotlights queer talent—both local and international—while fostering a safe, joyful space for self-expression, activism, and unity.
